name: Flying Pterodactyl Simulator: Dinosaurs Survival
description:
The most exciting battle of the pterodactyl or pterosaur has begun in a faraway island full with dangerous from fierce and frightening dinosaurs in many species. Only the strongest one will survive and become the ultimate dinosaur. To play this game is just to control pterodactyl to fight or attack via joystick. This is realistic simulator game of dinosaur fighting for survival has begun!!!
In this dangerous island is full of fierce and frightening dinosaurs such as Tyrannosaurus have sharp teeth for biting and tearing flesh, Stegosaurus with spikes on its tail for defence, Velociraptor is clever and nimble, Spinosaurus has a high spines like sails and many more living in this island. The strongest one will survive in this land. It is necessary to hunt and kill the enemy as much as you can to become the ultimate dinosaur and also have to eliminate the giant boss in each zone.
Pteranodon is a large pterodactyl (pterosaur), or flying reptile. The name meaning is “Toothless wing”. It’s not a dinosaur, but is a close relative of the dinosaurs. It’s primarily a fish eater, though It is very aggressive. It is the main character in this free game .

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Control the character by joystick to kill of enemies
- Upgrade the ability
- Fight boss in each zone.

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Smooth realistic character control
- Missions and upgrade abilities and system
- The ultimate and extra character
- Three beautiful world scene
- Enthusiastic music , noises and sounds
- Beautiful UI , button , animation and effect
